title: A friend of mine wants to join me in play League of Legend but he couldn't sign up PLEASE HELP
body: My friend was unable to sign up an account for League of Legend's Oceania sever. What should he do now?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you ask your friend to use a different email address when attempting to sign up, perhaps a gmail address?

Let me know if this helps,
Seph

Were there any errors that came up? Where exactly did they get stuck in the sign up process/how far did they get? Give as much detail as you can and it'll help the wrenchmen out a lot in finding a solution for you.

Your other option is to submit a support ticket [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Just be sure you avoid creating a new ticket or replying to the existing one until someone gets back to you, as it can bump you back to the bottom of the queue.
